createWrapToken(address,uint16).details: Creates a wrapped token for an ERC3643-compliant asset. Ensures that the token is not already wrapped and that the sender has the appropriate permissions. The wrapper contract is registered in the identity registry. Emits a `WrapTokenCreated` event upon success.

params._countryCode: The country code for identity registration.
params._erc3643: The address of the ERC3643 token to wrap.

init(address,address).details: Initializes the contract with the VERC20 implementation and Fund Factory addresses. Can only be called once due to the `initializer` modifier.

params._erc20Impl: The address of the VERC20 implementation contract.
params._fundFactory: The address of the Fund Factory contract.

setEscrowController(address).details: Sets the address of the escrow controller. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params.escrowController_: The address of the new escrow controller.

setFundFactory(address).details: Updates the Fund Factory contract address. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params.fundFactory_: The new Fund Factory contract address.

setOnchainID(address).details: Updates the on-chain identity address of the wrapper. Can only be called by the contract owner.

setStableCoin(string).details: Sets the stablecoin used for transactions. Ensures that the stablecoin is valid by checking with the escrow controller. Can only be called by the contract owner.

toERC20(address,uint256).details: Converts ERC3643 tokens into wrapped ERC20 tokens. Ensures the token has been wrapped and that the wrapping process is enabled. A tax fee is deducted before minting the wrapped tokens.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to wrap.
params._erc3643: The address of the ERC3643 token.

toERC3643(address,uint256).details: Converts wrapped ERC20 tokens back into ERC3643 tokens. Ensures that the ERC3643 token exists before proceeding.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to unwrap.
params._erc20: The address of the wrapped ERC20 token.
